McGinnis: - Fixed her gun having a recent regression that caused it to not have any spread
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Mini Turret|Size=20} Mini Turret damage reduced by up to 30% at 35m (now has bullet falloff from 20m to 35m)
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Mini Turret|Size=20} Mini Turret deploy time reduced from 2s to 1s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Mini Turret|Size=20} Mini Turret now shows up on the minimap
- Medicinal Spectre can no longer be attacked
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Spectral Wall|Size=20} Spectral Wall height increased by 2m
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Spectral Wall|Size=20} Spectral Wall slow duration increased from 2s to 2.5s
- Fixed a bug with {AbilityIcon|Ability=Spectral Wall|Size=20} Spectral Wall that caused the Rejuvenator to instantly drop
Vindicta: - Base movement speed increased from 7 to 8
- Fixed {AbilityIcon|Ability=Crow Familiar|Size=20} Crow Familiar T1 only bouncing to 1 additional target instead of 2
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20} Assassinate zoom level is reduced a bit
Lady Geist: - Updated {AbilityIcon|Ability=Lady Geist|Size=20} Lady Geist weapon sounds
Bebop: - Fixed a bug where pinging Bebop's Hook and {AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20} Sticky Bomb abilities would call the wrong ability name
Grey Talon: - Fixed a bug with releasing {AbilityIcon|Ability=Grey Talon|Size=20} Grey Talon's Owl early
- Fixed a bug that could allow Grey Talon to hit the same target multiple times when close during {AbilityIcon|Ability=Rain of Arrows|Size=20} Rain of Arrows
Dynamo: - Updated Dynamo's animation while using {AbilityIcon|Ability=Rejuvenating Aurora|Size=20} Rejuvenating Aurora
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Quantum Entanglement|Size=20} Quantum Entanglement is prevented from being cast when Dynamo is rooted or movement-silenced (such as by Slowing Hex)
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Rejuvenating Aurora|Size=20} Rejuvenating Aurora T3 reduced from +5% to +4%
Abrams: - Improved {AbilityIcon|Ability=Abrams|Size=20} Abrams animation while hovering in the air during his ultimate and adjusted the downward acceleration animation
Haze: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20} Bullet Dance T1 increased from +5 Weapon Damage to +6
- Fixed various bugs with the fire rate on {AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20} Bullet Dance (net effect of the bugs was that it often fired a little faster than it was intended to)
Infernus: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Afterburn|Size=20} Afterburn base dps reduced from 20 to 18
Kelvin: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20} Arctic Beam spirit scaling increased from 0.7 to 0.9
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20} Arctic Beam cooldown reduced from 25 to 23
Lash: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Ground Strike|Size=20} Ground Strike radius reduced from 14m to 13m
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Death Slam|Size=20} Death Slam radius reduced from 20m to 19m
Mo & Krill: - Base HP regen increased from 2.5 to 3
- Fixed {AbilityIcon|Ability=Scorn|Size=20} Scorn not healing for more with things like Mystic Burst
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Burrow|Size=20} Burrow now destroys breakables in its path
- Fixed Healing Booster not applying to {AbilityIcon|Ability=Scorn|Size=20} Scorn's 2x heal multiplier on heroes
- Added a bonus counter to show how much health has been earned by getting a kill during {AbilityIcon|Ability=Combo|Size=20} Combo
Paradox: - Base movement speed reduced from 7 to 6.5
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Kinetic Carbine|Size=20} Kinetic Carbine impact radius reduced by 15%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Kinetic Carbine|Size=20} Kinetic Carbine Max Stop Duration reduced from 0.75 to 0.5
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Kinetic Carbine|Size=20} Kinetic Carbine buff duration reduced from 6 to 4
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Kinetic Carbine|Size=20} Kinetic Carbine T1 increased from +0.5s Max Stop Duration to +0.75
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Kinetic Carbine|Size=20} Kinetic Carbine T2 now also increases buff by +2s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Paradoxical Swap|Size=20} Paradoxical Swap range reduced from 35m to 30m
Pocket: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Enchanter's Satchel|Size=20} Enchanter's Satchel can now be canceled by shooting
Seven: - Fixed Return Fire working with {AbilityIcon|Ability=Power Surge|Size=20} Power Surge
- No longer has base +15% Spirit Resistance
- Base health regen reduced from 2 to 1
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Static Charge|Size=20} Static Charge T1 improved from -15s Cooldown to -20s
Warden: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Willpower|Size=20} Willpower no longer loses movement speed when the shield is depleted
Wraith: - The {AbilityIcon|Ability=Royal Flush|Size=20} Royal Flush ability has been replaced with Card Trick. Card Trick enables Wraith's weapon damage to summon playing cards. Activating the ability throws one of the cards, which will fly towards the enemy or point under the crosshair and explode on impact.
Yamato: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Power Slash|Size=20} Power Slash damage reduced from 175 to 170
- Can now cancel {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flying Strike|Size=20} Flying Strike
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20} Shadow Transformation damage and debuff resistance reduced from 80% to 70%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20} Shadow Transformation duration increased from 4.5s to 5s

Metal Skin: - Fixed a recent bug with {AbilityIcon|Ability=Metal Skin|Size=20} Metal Skin that caused you to do zero bullet damage
Fire Rate: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Rate|Size=20} Fire Rate powerup duration increased from 35s to 45s and +15% {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Rate|Size=20} Fire Rate to +18%
- No longer grants +20% {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Rate|Size=20} Fire Rate for 4s on Soul Secure/Deny
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Swift Striker|Size=20} Swift Striker: Fire Rate increased from +20% to +22%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Suppressor|Size=20} Suppressor: Fire Rate reduction reduced from -35% to -30%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Mystic Slow|Size=20} Mystic Slow: Fire Rate reduction reduced from -35% to -30%
- Heroic Aura: No longer grants a 10% {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Rate Aura|Size=20} Fire Rate Aura
- Heroic Aura: Active now grants +20% Fire Rate instead of {AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Lifesteal|Size=20} Bullet Lifesteal
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Spiritual Overflow|Size=20} Spiritual Overflow: Fire Rate increased from +15% to +20%
Infuser: - Active Spirit Power increased from +12 to +18
Ammo Scavenger: - No longer grants +20% {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Rate|Size=20} Fire Rate for 4s on Soul Secure/Deny
- Now grants +3 Spirit for 18s on Soul Secure/Deny. Multiple instances stack and refresh the duration. Max 12 stacks.
Swift Striker: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Rate|Size=20} Fire Rate increased from +20% to +22%
Active Reload: - Timing window to click increased from 0.2s to 0.3s
- Active {AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Lifesteal|Size=20} Bullet Lifesteal increased from 30% to 40%
Bullet Lifesteal: - Active {AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Lifesteal|Size=20} Bullet Lifesteal increased from 30% to 40%
- Active now grants +20% Fire Rate instead of {AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Lifesteal|Size=20} Bullet Lifesteal
Reactive Barrier: - Spirit Shield Health reduced from +500 to +200
Suppressor: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Rate|Size=20} Fire Rate reduction reduced from -35% to -30%
Mystic Slow: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Rate|Size=20} Fire Rate reduction reduced from -35% to -30%
Point Blank: - Bullet Shield health increased from +200 to +225
Heroic Aura: - No longer grants a 10% {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Rate Aura|Size=20} Fire Rate Aura
- Active now grants +20% Fire Rate instead of {AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Lifesteal|Size=20} Bullet Lifesteal
Fire Rate Aura: - No longer grants a 10% {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Rate Aura|Size=20} Fire Rate Aura
Imbued Ability: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Surge of Power|Size=20} Surge of Power: Imbued Ability Spirit Power increased from +20 to +24
Surge of Power: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Imbued Ability|Size=20} Imbued Ability Spirit Power increased from +20 to +24
Ethereal Shift: - Post-cast bonus is now still granted when ending the buff early
Health Regen: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Superior Duration|Size=20} Superior Duration: Now grants +4 Health Regen
Spiritual Overflow: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Rate|Size=20} Fire Rate increased from +15% to +20%
Frenzy: - Whenever you go back above 40%, the buff lingers for 4s
Siphon Bullets: - Max HP Steal duration increased from 12s to 15s
Slowing Hex: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Quantum Entanglement|Size=20} Quantum Entanglement is prevented from being cast when Dynamo is rooted or movement-silenced (such as by Slowing Hex)
Mystic Burst: - Fixed {AbilityIcon|Ability=Scorn|Size=20} Scorn not healing for more with things like Mystic Burst
Healing Booster: - Fixed Healing Booster not applying to {AbilityIcon|Ability=Scorn|Size=20} Scorn's 2x heal multiplier on heroes
Return Fire: - Fixed Return Fire working with {AbilityIcon|Ability=Power Surge|Size=20} Power Surge

Activating the ability throws one of the cards, which will fly towards the enemy or point under the crosshair and explode on impact.

General: - Added a hero based mmr system, so when you join a match with a specific hero the matchmaker adjusts the skill level it assumes you are at by a percentage up or down based on your experience and performance levels with that hero.
- Added settings option to allow weapon zoom to be a toggle
- Added a game volume slider which will control volume independently from voice chat (VoIP)
- General improvements to voice chat quality
- Non-matchmaking lobbies are now considered safe to abandon
- Crates now show the amount of souls they have in the tooltip
- Greater contrast between team and enemy sounds
- Updated headshot hit indicator
- Fixed a bug that could cause button input detection to malfunction
- Fixed an issue where the Rejuvenator being stolen was firing incorrectly
- Fixed a bug introduced in last week's update that caused gun spreads to not work properly
- Added an effect at the bottom of a player's screen whenever they are standing on something that causes damage
- Flex slot removed from killing the Patron and added to killing all Walkers
- Urn now spawns on both sides of the map. Bounty for each is reduced by 40%
- Rejuvenator now reduces players' next respawn time by 75% instead of giving a 3s respawn time
- Golden Statues no longer drop powerups (time duration buffs). Instead they now drop small permanent bonuses. These stack and do not decay with time or death. Drop rates rebalanced.
+2 Spirit
+3% Ammo
+15 Max HP (this has slightly higher odds of dropping than the others)
+0.5% Cooldown Reduction
+2% Weapon Damage
- At defined locations around the map, powerups now spawn starting 10 minutes (and every 5 minutes after). There are 6 spots where they spawn and they are indicated on the minimap when they are up.
- Movement powerup duration increased from 30s to 50s
- Regeneration powerup duration increased from 25s to 45s
- Stamina powerup duration increased from 80s to 120s
- Cooldown powerup is unchanged
- Clip powerup is unchanged
- Breakables initial spawn time increased from 2 min to 3 min
- Fixed being able to hide inside the Guardian's head
- Jumping after a dash jump no longer causes your hero to sometimes jump in place
- Breakables souls base value reduced by 30%. Increases to +15% of current values over 30 minutes. (so -30% to +15% from start to 30 min)
- All hero guns' reload time reduced by 5%
- Zipline Boost ability cooldown reduced from 380s to 340s
- Medic Trooper heal now bounces to up to one other allied hero within 25m from the hero
- Trooper gold sharing radius from the location of the allied hero reduced from 50m to 40m
- Creep waves now land at their lane destinations at the same time as each other
- Added connection hallway between outer lane Shop and crate room
- Opened up Authority Building and Jazz Club to the Guardian side
- Added intermediate cover in front of Amber Orange Guardian and Sapphire Blue Guardian
- Added Veils to entrances to base fountain
- Extended cover near Sapphire Orange Guardian to match Amber Blue
- Extended alcove on outer lane cover position in front of the Shop
- Underground tunnels have more light
- Removed underground tunnel alcoves
- Added signs for entrance to the underground tunnel from the warehouse side
